scripts.e2e-test:debug: npx mkdirp ./tests_output/reports/screenshots && node --inspect-brk node_modules/.bin/cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require step-definitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty  --format json:tests_output/reports/cucumber_report.json
scripts.e2e-test: npx mkdirp ./tests_output/reports/screenshots && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require step-definitions --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:tests_output/reports/cucumber_report.json
